attributes.action: Call a General Election before leaving the EU.
attributes.background: The Leave campaign was full of misinformation  and political one-upmanship (Boris).  The Remain campaign was largely complacent (David).  The May government a) won't hold a second referendum, and b) won't revoke Article 50, so the electorate must be enabled to democratically remove them from power.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's very similar to petitions we already have open. 
 
You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449

Immediately the UK does not leave the EU on 29/03/2019, call a general election https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/240407

Make a decision on Brexit and then call a general election. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/249018
